about_the_game:
□Introduction

Huh... umm...?
Meet Yuu, our hero who just can't jump high enough to escape their tiny little world.
But wait—here comes YOU, the super hacker extraordinaire! 💻✨
Hack Yuu's parameters, tweak the world itself, and guide them all the way to their happy ending! Let’s get hacking!

□ What's This Game About?

You're a super hacker! 🖥️
Your mission? Hack the system and this game's world to guide Yuu, who just keeps wandering around on their own.



Boost Yuu’s jump power to reach new heights,
crank up their speed to explore far-off places,
or tweak gravity to save them from sticky situations!

But why is Yuu stuck in this strange loop?
There’s a mystery hiding in this world.

As you adventure with Yuu, you’ll unlock more hacking abilities to bend the rules of the game.
Use those powers to carve a path forward and experience the story you’ll share with Yuu.
The journey is waiting—let’s hack our way to the truth!

name: Take Me to the Ending!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
